channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
What's New in Version 1.1.0

New Features

  • Browser Privacy Cleaner - Clear data from Safari, Chrome, Firefox, and Edge
  • Orphaned Files Scanner - Detect leftover files from uninstalled applications
  • Duplicate File Finder - Find duplicate files with SHA256 hashing and cancellation support
  • Menu Bar Monitor - Real-time CPU/RAM/Disk stats with 4 display modes
  • Permissions Management - Manage FDA and folder access permissions
  • Empty Trash functionality with confirmation dialog
  • Select All/Deselect All in cleanup categories

Improvements

  • Complete Theme system with consistent typography, spacing, and corner radius
  • Enhanced UI with standardized glass styling across all views
  • Improved app initialization to avoid unnecessary TCC permission prompts
  • Better localization support with runtime language switching
  • Refactored Performance and Applications views with reusable components

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed FDA detection with multiple fallback methods
  • Improved async update checking and command escaping
  • Enhanced thread safety in file scanning operations

item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
What's New in Version 1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • Liquid Glass UI design for macOS Tahoe
  • Graceful fallback to material design on macOS Sonoma/Sequoia
  • Smart Scan for quick system cleanup
  • Disk Cleaner with category-based file management
  • Space Lens with treemap visualization
  • Performance monitoring and maintenance tools
  • Applications manager with Homebrew integration
  • Startup items management
  • Port management and process control
  • System health dashboard
  • Multi-language support (English, Italian, Spanish)
